text: Hello all, I want to show the search result content in the search popup for my website. Is this possible in HubSpot?
It is possible. You can start by closing the search results module and going from there
Thank you..do we have an example or learning for it? like how we can fetch all the search data in the popup?

Don't have examples but some hints might be helpful. 

You will find Javascript in search result module which are getting results. so you have to figure it out how you can show result to pop-up or wherever you would like to show by modifying JS, or else you can use search API as well.
